Soil biodiversity is a nature-based solution to many of the global challenges facing humanity. 

Yet, it is threatened by unsustainable soil management practices, erosion, pollution, urbanization & more.

Sunday is #WorldSoilDay. https://t.co/kdohd9me8s via @FAO https://t.co/oa8sN296W4

Road accidents are responsible for nearly 1.3 million annual deaths & up to 50 million injuries globally. 

They are also the leading killer of children and young people worldwide.

A new global plan aims to cut these numbers in half by 2030. https://t.co/BjwXXKstEW
